description: Sequential line number used to order entries within a reservation record or result set.
Indicator to send a notification to the person who booked when the reservation is created.
Temporary field used during the reservation workflow; likely stores transient status or data at reservation time; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user or process that created the record.
Date/time when the record was first created.
Identifier of the user or process that last modified the record.
Date/time when the record was last modified.
